Package net.royalur

Class GameBuilder.BaseSimpleGameBuilder<R extends Roll,​SELF extends GameBuilder.BaseSimpleGameBuilder<R,​SELF>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.royalur.GameBuilder.BaseSimpleGameBuilder<R,​SELF>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - The type of rolls that the dice produce.
    SELF - The type of the subclass of this builder.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameBuilder.SimpleGameBuilder, GameBuilder.SimpleWithDiceGameBuilder
    Enclosing class:
    GameBuilder
    public abstract static class GameBuilder.BaseSimpleGameBuilder<R extends Roll,​SELF extends GameBuilder.BaseSimpleGameBuilder<R,​SELF>>
extends java.lang.Object
    A builder for constructing games that follow the simple rules.

      • buildRules

        @Nonnull
public abstract SimpleRuleSet<SimplePiece,​PlayerState,​R> buildRules()
        Generates a simple rule set to match the settings in this builder. The rules do not contain any player identification information set in this builder.
        Returns:
        A simple rule set to match the settings in this builder.

      • buildPlayerState

        @Nonnull
protected PlayerState buildPlayerState​(@Nonnull
                                       SimpleRuleSet<SimplePiece,​PlayerState,​R> rules,
                                       @Nonnull
                                       Player player,
                                       @Nullable
                                       java.lang.String name)
        Generates a player state using rules for player that may or may not have a name, depending on whether name is null.
        Parameters:
        rules - The rules to use to generate the player state.
        player - The player that the state should represent.
        name - The name of the player, or null.
        Returns:
        A player state representing player, that may be named.
